docs.title: Git Tutorial for non-programmers
docs.text: Git is a free and open source distributed version control system designed to handle everything from small to very large projects with speed and efficiency. It is the most popular version control system among professional programmers, and this tutorial aims to making it understandable and usable by non-programmers.

docs.title: About this tutorial
docs.text: The Git Tutorial for non-programmers has been created within the Bolt and Beoutiful GROW project by KCI.
